lines: 1. Inyora abaisraeli,Bakemurunganeria Musa;'Ndamwamu ya Nyasa'egacha,Basirera as'eroro.
Datani, Kora, Abiiramu,'S'endamwamu y'oborai;Rikamanoka bakarimera,Nekiorokereri'ase tore.
3. Abachorwa b'obokoreri,Timomenya Yerusalemu;Mwarangerigwe Makedonia,Genda o erio mobakonye.
4. Mbwachani bwa kerengo ki obo?'Monene gokwa igoro yaito;Erio tonyare koborigwa,'Babe twabeir'abana baye.
